question:
Which among the following about the Gulf of Mannar is/ are correct?
1. It separates India & Srilanka
2. Tuticorin port is located near it
3. It is the first marine Biosphere Reserve of India
4. Mannar Island is located to the North-east of Gulf of Mannar
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Gulf of Mannar separates India & Srilanka. The Tuticorin port is located near it. It is the first marine Biosphere Reserve of India. Mannar Island is located to the North-east of the Gulf of Mannar.
